title: What is Containerization?
description: What is Containerization?
tabs: ['Architecture Overview','What is Containerization?', 'What is Helm?', 'What is Kubernetes?','What is OpenShift?']
---
Containerization makes it easier for developers to develop, deploy, and operate applications by simplifying the packaging and deployment process.

SPM is packaged as Docker® containers, and running on IKS or OpenShift

[Docker](https://www.docker.com/get-started) is an open source tool that creates, deploys, and runs applications by using containers.

**What is Containerization?**
